title: Obection to the world economic theory

content.prompt: Which of the following would illustrate an objection to this world economic theory?

choices.label: The use of serfs to produce grain for export in Poland
The development of manufacturing in colonial Latin America
Import of European art works by planters in the United States south

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
